Room.Name: The Southern Path Junction
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the junction of the center path and the south ofern path.
Room.LongDescription: The Center Path, naturally, runs through the center of the Barbarian Pits. The Southern Path runs along the southern border of the Pits. The barbarian race isn't all that bright and do not have a lot of fancy names for their roads, especially since they're just dirt paths. The primative training facility for the tribesmen is located to the south here. The barbarians are known to test their own before allowing them to advance to higher levels.
